DOC.brief_title: Prevention Postoperative Events Following Reversal With Sugammadex Neostigmine
DOC.detailed_description: This local , multi-centre , prospective , randomise , double blind trial 976 patient . Objectives : The primary objective determine use sugammadex ( compare neostigmine ) reduce rate postoperative pulmonary complication ( PPCs ) . Secondary objective determine use sugammadex compare traditional reversal agent improve patient quality recovery , reduce rate postoperative nausea vomit reduces rate airway complication Post Anaesthesia Care Unit ( PACU ) . Study procedure : Following informed consent prior surgery , patient randomise two group allocate drug use reversal muscle relaxation ; 1 . 2mg/kg sugammadex 2 . 50mcg/kg neostigmine 10mcg/kg glycopyrrolate Randomisation via computer generate number , seal opaque , sequentially numbered envelope . Treating anaesthetist staff assess outcome blind treatment . Patients neuromuscular transmission ( NMT ) monitoring intraoperatively ensure return train-of-four count ( TOFC ) > 2 prior reversal . Muscle relaxant limit rocuronium vecuronium , choice individual anaesthetist . As study plan 'real world ' trial , mode anaesthesia , analgesia , postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) prophylaxis time reversal determine individual treating anaesthetist . Postoperative outcome data collect recovery unit , postoperative day 1 2 ( still inpatient ) , hospital discharge via 30 day post-operative phone call . Statistical Analysis : Conservatively estimate baseline incidence PPC 7 % baseline incidence equally conservative estimate sugammadex reduce 3 % would produce clinically relevant number need treat ( NNT ) 29 . Accepting alpha error 0.05 beta error 0.2 would require 930 patient . Allowing 5 % incomplete data loss follow require 976 patient . Groups analyse intention-to-treat basis 1 . PPC rate , QoR-15 score hospital stay assess continuous variable 2 . Post operative Nausea Vomiting ( PONV ) score assess ordinal variable 3 . Mortality presence respiratory PACU event assess categorical variable . The effect sugammadex continuous variable analyse 2-tailed Student T-test . The effect sugammadex ordinal categorical variable analyse Chi-squared test . Binomial regression analysis perform categorical outcome subgroup analysis . Logistic regression perform analyse effect PONV risk PONV score . Appropriate statistical test confirm test assumption meet perform . In case non-parametric data , appropriate test perform . Interim analysis plan 50 % data completion .
